name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ronald M. GRIM, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ronald M. GRIM, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Court of Common Pleas of Berks County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Louis R. Rizzuto, Reading, for appellant.
Charles M. Guthrie, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 943
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ronald M. GRIM, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 19, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17, 1981.
Louis R. Rizzuto, Reading, for appellant.
Charles M. Guthrie, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
